nodes.text: The Loronar Corporation was a company that produced various technological products. These included Mk. III Optimized Galven Coils, a model of starship laser focusing array, and the Model 4 Hostile Environment Treatment, a model of radiation shielding for armor. Both products were available during the Galactic Civil War.

Loronar Corporation was mentioned in the new Star Wars canon in the 2016 Star Wars Roleplaying supplement Special Modifications, which was published by Fantasy Flight Games. The company originated in the Star Wars Legends continuity, where it was first mentioned in The Star Wars Rules Companion, a 1989 roleplaying supplement written by Greg Gorden for West End Games' Star Wars: The Roleplaying Game.
